Room.Name: Glabor Gulley
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the western end of Glabor Gulley, near an avalanche's slide path.
Room.LongDescription: To the east the gulley climbs out of sight into the towering mountains, and the west it drops out of sight over the crest of the remains of a recent avalanche. There seems to be hundreds of small caves dug in the slopes of the gulley, and it looks like a community area in the center of them.
